content:
D
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
I worked in a Linux virtual machine and used Ubuntu. I first opened the nano -editor and copied in the 
provided C code. I created cashier.c file and after saving it, I exited the editor. I used the command line 
gcc cashier.c -o cashier to compile the progra m, which created an executable file cashier. I checked the 
executable file by listing all the files in the directory using ls -l. I confirmed the program executed and 
generated the correct output by running the command ./cashier, entering sample inputs for  quantity and 
payments, and receiving the change and receipt in the output. All the steps were documented in a word 
file, which was later converted to a PDF and submitted as part of the project.
